After reading Prowar students need to be vocal CT Feb PERIOD  I felt like I should make the following arguments against war in Iraq PERIOD I will make it clear from the beginning that I am against war with Iraq at the moment.First we need to end our unilateral crusade PERIOD The United Nations was founded over  years ago so other countries could not attack each other without some justification PERIOD Secretary of State Colin Powell has said the United Nations places itself in danger of irrelevance if it allows Iraq to continue to defy its will. frankly acting unilaterally is what undermines the United Nations and makes it that much more irrelevant PERIOD Even if taking out Saddam Hussein is the right thing to do we can really only justify it based on his violations of U.N PERIOD resolutions PERIOD If we do not use the United Nations we have little justification PERIOD
